body_html: Depends on what you mean by "general AMD GPU support". If you mean really old dGPU or APUs, I don't know. But if you have newer (2nd Gen GCN or newer), hipTensorFlow (v1.0.1) running on ROCm was working pretty well.
body_text: Depends on what you mean by "general AMD GPU support". If you mean really old dGPU or APUs, I don't know. But if you have newer (2nd Gen GCN or newer), hipTensorFlow (v1.0.1) running on ROCm was working pretty well.
body: Depends on what you mean by "general AMD GPU support". If you mean really old dGPU or APUs, I don't know. But if you have newer (2nd Gen GCN or newer), hipTensorFlow (v1.0.1) running on ROCm was working pretty well.
